author: max
name: EasterHunt
install_msg:
Thanks for installing!
The rarity for eggs are explained here: <https://easterhunt.maxapp.tv>.
If you enjoy my work, you can donate at [buymeacoffee](<https://buymeacoffee.com/ltzmax>)
description: Easter hunt cog that provides a fun Easter-themed game where users can hunt for eggs, work for egg shards, give eggs to others or steal, and earn achievements.
short: Easter hunt cog that provides a fun Easter-themed game where users can hunt for eggs, work for egg shards, give eggs to others or steal, and earn achievements.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any End User Data although it does store Discord IDs to track user progress and economy data. This data can be deleted with the `[p]easterhunt resetme` command.
